name: Boostilicious
description:
Boostilicious is my first "game", based on an amazing Unity3d course from GameDev.tv, if you want to start making your own game(s), go check those guys out!

You are controlling a Rocket on an asteroid, trying to avoid obstacles and finally landing on a save spot. At this time, there a just 5 levels total, but i will come back from time to time and put my (hopefully) grown knowledge into it to improve this little project.

I would really appreciate your feedback!
